Name: Corruption Beast
Description: A beast on the lower levels of the spire. It is unknown to how they got this corruption on them. The corruption rots away at it's skin and with every move more and more of it's flesh get torn off. It is a hulking monstrocity, crawling on all fours. A large mouth snarls at everything it sees.

Drop_Table.Name: Corrupted Flesh
Drop_Table.Description: A piece of corrupted flesh that has dropped from the corrupted. It has little use. Dark purple tendrils scorch the skin, wrapping around it like snakes devouring its prey

Drop_Table.Name: Battered Tree Trunk
Drop_Table.Description: A tree ripped from the Sylven plains. It has seen much use, perhaps banging against other foes. Termites bite and gnaw at the tree trunk making it quite fragile.

Name: Jawworm
Description: A primitive creature that is found in the lower levels of the spire. It is a worm that is consistested of mostly a mouth. Razor sharp teeth line its jaws as it gnaws its way towards flesh. It lives underground, burrowing underneath the floor and crawling to its next prey.

Drop_Table.Name: Sharpened Fangs
Drop_Table.Description: The fangs of a Jawworm. Some people have used it to sharpen their weapons and improve them but other than that, it has little use.
